articles.title: Miners arrested at 'lawless' rescue site
articles.description: More than 60 are held as Liberian authorities seek to restore order at a mine where dozens are trapped.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Liberia is rich in mineral deposits - and full of illicit mines

articles.title: Polish PM cancels trip amid Holocaust row
articles.description: Mateusz Morawiecki will not now visit Israel, after PM Benjamin Netanyahu said "Poles co-operated".
articles.content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki (L) met Mr Netanyahu this month
